title: Nurse Norton’s Affair
description: At Mount Verdant Hospital, Nurse Cleo Norton is having a secret affair with Dr. Neil Boyd, but his father disapproves. Will Sister Mary MacArthur ruin everything?
quote: You don’t have to be mad to work here, but it helps!
altHero: Nurse Cleo looks despondent as Dr. Boyd talks to her from the side
alt1: Dr. Boyd Sr. gets ready for surgery
alt2: Cleo talks with a friend in the showers
alt3: Sister Mary MacArthur talks with Dr. Boyd
alt4: Nurse Cleo and Dr. Boyd smile at each other
